General.Name: BeiJing Certificate Authority Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Certificate Authority Co., Ltd. provides information security solutions in China. The company offers electronic certification services, electronic certification products and manageable information security services. It provides digital certificate authentication system, certificate management server, office/pdf web page electronic signature, pdf signature server, time stamp service system, signature verification server, handwritten digital signature system, trusted document management system, drawing digital delivery system, electronic contract signing system, and unified certification management system products. The company also offers trusted network authentication, SSL certificate, digital certificate, cloud signature, product solution, electronic bidding solution, mobile law enforcement solution, electronic license solution, mobile office solution, electronic signature judicial proof, and electronic security services. Beijing Certificate Authority Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.

2.Name: Ms. Xiu Bin  Qi
